description: This Dart file defines the PaymentScreen widget for a Flutter app, enabling users to select a payment method, view delivery details, and initiate a checkout process.

classes.name: PaymentScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays payment options, delivery address, and a submit button to place an order.

classes.name: _PaymentScreenState
classes.description: State class for PaymentScreen, managing UI state, payment method selection, and submission logic.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the payment screen, including delivery info, payment options, and the submit button.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Asynchronous method that handles order placement, displays loading state, and navigates to the order tracking screen upon success.
